DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Tickets Requested
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets in the Selected Period","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"600","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed To Do","metricFieldValue":"DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed Work in Progress","metricFieldValue":"DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  d.effort,
        j.NameAndExternalId as Job,
        j.[State] as Stage,
        j.[Date] as Enddate,
        j.Oid,
        isnull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as Color,
        datediff(day,getdate(),j.[Date]) as Days,
        sum(iif(j.[State] = 'To Do' and j.[Date] < getdate(), 1, 0)) over() as DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal,
        sum(iif(j.[State] = 'Work in Progress' and j.[Date] < getdate(), 1, 0)) over() as DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal,
        (select top 1 ass.[User] from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast where ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as ExecutorOid,
        (select top 1 ssu.Name from [User] ssu, Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast where ssu.Oid = ass.[User] and ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as ExecutorHasImage,
        (select top 1 ssu.HasImage from [User] ssu, Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast where ssu.Oid = ass.[User] and ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as Executor,
        j.Client as ClientName,
        j.ClientId,
        cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage
from    Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst, CommercialClient cc, SkillJob d
where   cc.Oid = j.ClientId and
        d.Oid = j.Oid and 
        ws.Oid = d.WorkflowStateId and
        wst.Oid = d.WorkflowStateTypeId and
        j.Department in ('DevOps','Operations','Releases') and
        j.State in ('Work in Progress', 'Under Approval', 'To Do', 'Waiting', 'To Install','Returned')
      /*[DateFilter]*/ and j.[Date] >= @FromDate and j.[Date] <= @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Over Time view
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Closed and In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019/08/1","endDate":"2019/12/30","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select max(datepart(ww, j.[Date])) as week,
        min(j.[Date]) as WeekStart,
        sum(iif(j.State = 'Done', 1, 0)) as Done, 
        sum(iif(j.State != 'Done', 1, 0)) as ToDo
from    Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j, 
        WorkflowState ws, 
        WorkflowStateType wst
where   ws.Oid = j.StateId and
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
        j.Department in ('DevOps','Operations') and
        j.[State] in ('Done', 'Work in Progress', 'Under Approval', 'To Do', 'Waiting','Returned') and
        j.[Date] >= @FromDate and j.[Date] <= @ToDate
group by datepart(yyyy, j.[Date]), datepart(ww, j.[Date])
order by WeekStart","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Execution Pipeline
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Comparison between Under Approval, To Do's & Work In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"funnel","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Under Approval","metricFieldValue":"UnderApprovalGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? To Do","metricFieldValue":"ToDoGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Work in Progress","metricFieldValue":"WorkInProgressGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Done","metricFieldValue":"DoneGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select j.[State] as Stage, 
count(*) as Total 
from    Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j
where   j.Department in ('DevOps','Operations') and
        j.[State] in ('Under Approval', 'To Do', 'Work in Progress', 'Done')
/*[DateFilter]*/ and j.[Date] >= @FromDate and j.[Date] <= @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/ 
group by j.[State]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]
